mapper.select: SELECT select_seat.user_id, select_seat.movie_show_time_id, select_seat.theater_hall_id, select_seat.x, select_seat.y, seat_area.price as area_price, seat_area.name as area_name, movie.id as movie_id, movie.name as movie_name, movie.cover as movie_poster, cinema_spec.name as spec_name, cinema_spec_spec.plus_price, select_seat.movie_ticket_type_id, FROM select_seat LEFT JOIN seat ON seat.theater_hall_id = select_seat.theater_hall_id AND seat.x_axis = select_seat.x AND seat.y_axis = select_seat.y AND seat.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN movie_show_time ON select_seat.movie_show_time_id = movie_show_time.id LEFT JOIN movie ON movie_show_time.movie_id = movie.id LEFT JOIN seat_area ON seat.seat_area_id = seat_area.id LEFT JOIN theater_hall ON select_seat.theater_hall_id = theater_hall.id AND theater_hall.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN cinema_spec ON theater_hall.cinema_spec_id = cinema_spec.id LEFT JOIN cinema_spec_spec ON cinema_spec_spec.spec_id = theater_hall.cinema_spec_id AND cinema_spec_spec.deleted = 0 WHERE select_seat.user_id = #{userId} AND select_seat.movie_show_time_id = #{movieShowTimeId} AND select_seat.select_seat_state = #{seatState} AND select_seat.deleted = 0

--- 统计每日上映场次，以及前10名上映电影的场次数 WITH daily_total AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('day', TO_TIMESTAMP(movie_show_time.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS start_time, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM movie_show_time WHERE movie_show_time.deleted = 0 GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', TO_TIMESTAMP(movie_show_time.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) ), daily_movie_count AS ( SELECT TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('day', TO_TIMESTAMP(movie_show_time.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS start_time, movie.name AS movie_name, movie.id AS movie_id, COUNT(*) AS movie_count, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(DATE_TRUNC('day', TO_TIMESTAMP(movie_show_time.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rn FROM movie_show_time LEFT JOIN movie ON movie_show_time.movie_id = movie.id WHERE movie_show_time.deleted = 0 GROUP BY DATE_TRUNC('day', TO_TIMESTAMP(movie_show_time.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')), movie.name, movie.id ) SELECT dt.start_time, dt.total_count, dmc.movie_id, dmc.movie_name, dmc.movie_count FROM daily_total dt LEFT JOIN daily_movie_count dmc ON dt.start_time = dmc.start_time WHERE dmc.rn < 10 OR dmc.rn IS NULL ORDER BY dt.start_time ASC, dmc.movie_count DESC;
